item.title: How to report a SELinux bug
item.description: A friendly reminder how to report a SELinux bug. First off, find that there actually is a denial: # ausearch -m AVC If there is, let’s create a good report. First, install additional tools. On EL7 do: # yum -y install setools-console policycoreutils-python policycoreutils selinux-policy-devel On EL8 one package was renamed: # yum -y install setools-console policycoreutils-devel policycoreutils selinux-policy-devel Now, generate interfaces for audit2allow: # sepolgen-ifgen As the next step I actually recommend to turn off enforcing mode although it can sometimes generate lots of unrelated noise (if domains are not right).
